title.narrative: Hebei Rural Renewable Energy Development Project

description.narrative: The Project Development Objective (PDO) is to demonstrate sustainable biogas production and utilization to reduce environmental pollution and supply clean energy in rural areas of Hebei Province.

condition.narrative: Additional RAPs, Section I (E) 4 of Schedule of Porject Agreement: Hebei Province to have satisfactory Additional ResettlementPlans prepared, adopted, and disclosed for subproject adjustments and any new activities identified under the project frameworkduring the project implementation. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

IBRD withdrawal, Section IV (B) 1 (b) of Schedule 2 of Loan Agreement: Hebei Province to provide evidence that all the SubsidiaryLoan Agreements have been duly executed on behalf of Hebei Province and the respective PIU, and are binding and enforceable uponthe respective parties thereto in according with their terms. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Independent safeguards monitoring and evaluation, Section I (E) 7 of Schedule of Project Agreement: Hebei Province to haveindependent monitoring and evaluation of the implementation of Project safeguards instruments carried out and semi-annual reportssubmitted to the Bank. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Institutional arrangements, Section I (A) of Schedule of Project Agreement: Hebei Province to maintain the Project Leading Groupand the Project Management Office in a satisfactory manner throughout Project implementation. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS
Project Implementation Plan, Section I (c) of Schedule of Project Agreement: Hebei Province to comply with the ProjectImplementation Plan. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS
